name: Marvel's Spider-Man
summary: Starring the world’s most iconic Super Hero, Spider-Man features the acrobatic abilities, improvisation and web-slinging that the wall-crawler is famous for, while also introducing elements never-before-seen in a Spider-Man game. From traversing with parkour and utilizing the environment, to new combat and blockbuster set pieces, it’s Spider-Man unlike any you’ve played before.

name: God of War
storyline: Many years have passed since Kratos, Spartan warrior and former Greek God of War, took his vengeance against the Greek Gods, and he now lives with his young son Atreus in ancient Norway in the realm of Midgard. The game begins after the death of the Jötunn warrior Faye, Kratos' second wife and Atreus' mother, whose last request was for her ashes to be spread at the highest speak of the nine realms. Kratos and Atreus prepare a funeral pyre for her, mourn her death and soon go on a hunt as per Kratos' desire. However much to Kratos' disappointment, Atreus proves his incompetence and lack of focus, making Kratos reconsider taking Atreus in his journey. Kratos is soon attacked by a mysterious stranger with godlike powers, and who cannot feel anything physically. After seemingly killing him, Kratos reluctantly takes Atreus with him and begins their journey.
summary: God of War is the sequel to God of War III as well as a continuation of the canon God of War chronology. Unlike previous installments, this game focuses on Norse mythology and follows an older and more seasoned Kratos and his son Atreus in the years since the third game. It is in this harsh, unforgiving world that he must fight to survive… and teach his son to do the same.

name: Tabletop Playground
summary: Play any kind of tabletop game you want online! You make the rules in a physically simulated 3D sandbox. Or create your own games using the integrated editor and share them with the world!

name: Apollo LM
summary: 3D fly and land the Apollo Lunar Module on the moon! Easy and precise control with one finger. Real moon topology mapping. Rewrite humanity's greatest achievement and... Land the 1st woman on the moon! Place your country's flag on the moon! Apollo mission dialogue voices transcription. Be Miss or Mr Armstrong. Evolve your Astronaut level. Evolve the Lunar Module. Challenge your astronaut friends through the Game Center.

name: Cropped
summary: Cropped is a first-person action horror adventure - Survive the night as the farm you've arrived at has taken a turn for the worse...

name: FIshing Adventure VR
summary: Fishing Adventure VR is a typical fishing game, where the player can (drums) catch different fish species! Fish in USA, Hawaii and other unique fisheries.

name: Neon Arena
summary: Neon Arena is a space arcade scoring arena game.

name: Adventure Field 4
summary: Several years after Atoa defeated his evil self, Eras, and Marok took their place as leaders of the Sarook Kingdom. Atoa defeated the evil that was born from within him but a greater danger is now looming upon Sarook kingdom... The direct sequel to Adventure Field 3... Adventure Field 4 is a 20 hour, semi open-world, turn-based JRPG. Battle monsters, complete quests and save Sarook Kingdom! In this game you will have to fight your way through dungeons and powerful enemies to try gathering souls gems. Between the fighting and the exploration, you can cook and grow some vegetables, discover hidden mysteries hidden within the night and day system, try to find what people need to finish side quests and find many collectibles and secrets along the way! In Adventure Field 4, you can forget the old way of getting gold and items. You will need to find a variety of chests to open at your local chest opener! Having some difficulty with particular enemies in combat? Ask your royal team mate, Eserod! He will tell you about monsters strengths and weakness! You will need his help for sure... Dark hours are coming again to Sarook Kingdom... The Kingdom can feel the burning souls of the calamity... The Kingdom will fall again... But not if you can save it!...

name: Total Lockdown
summary: Total Lockdown is a battle royale on the top floors of a giant skyscraper. In this action shooter, the goal is to survive using any available weapons, gadgets, and tricks. Fight for fortune and fame in a battle to the death!

name: Once More
summary: Rewrite the past to create the future you deserve.

name: Sleep When I'm Dead
summary: Sleep When I'm Dead is a survival horror twin stick shooter with a distinctive art style.

name: Magenta Horizon
storyline: Play as Gretel, a reaper in this purgatory-like afterlife. After being exiled from her sanctuary for 200 years, she is freed from her sarcophagus by a wandering soul named Archibald. Seeking purpose in this afterlife she decides to guide Archibald back to the sanctuary she was long exiled from. The journey won't be easy however as the path is fraught with all manner of grotesque demons starving for souls.
summary: Magenta Horizon is a fast-paced hack-and-slash 2D platformer where you play as Gretel, a reaper in this purgatory-like afterlife.

name: Clint is Not an Incel: A Word on Fatness and Masculinity
summary: A Bitsy essay on the perception of fat men in games and culture.

name: Maximum Velocity
summary:
Maximum Velocity is a high-stakes, high-speed racing game looking to shake up the racing genre forever. Join your friends and take on challenges in an immersive, ever-changing world. Drift, drag, or sprint your way around Industrial City and discover hidden secrets to the lore and ever-evolving story.
Drive the way you want to.

Upgrade your vehicles to handle the way you want them to. Make them as fast as you want or as drifty as you wish. You are in control of your car and how it handles. Unlock performance parts by exploring the city and doing challenges to get rewards and upgrades.

name: The Dark Pictures Anthology: Volume 1 - Limited Edition
storyline:
- The Dark Pictures - Little Hope
Abandoned and all alone, 4 college students and their teacher become stranded in an isolated town mile from anywhere after their bus crashes in bad weather. Trapped by a mysterious fog in the town of Little Hope, they search desperately for a means of escape whilst visions from the past haunt them from the shadows.

- The Dark Pictures - Man of Medan
You are about to embark on a troublesome journey! - Five friends set sail on a holiday diving trip. As the day unfolds and a storm rolls in, their trip soon changes into something much more sinister and terrifying!
summary:
Box contents:
- Xbox Game: The Dark Pictures - Little Hope
- Xbox Game: The Dark Pictures - Man of Medan
- Dark Pictures Cloth Map
- Map Pins
- Steelcase

name: TrapBot
summary: TrapBot is a dynamic 2D action hardcore platformer in an urban style

name: Landlord's Super
summary: Your quintessential construction simulator is here. Take a dodgy loan, restore a property, move in the locals, attend to their grievances, then celebrate with a pint in this fully-simulated, open-world 1980's Britain.

name: SnowRunner: Scorched Vinyl Wrap
summary:
Explore SnowRunner in style with the unique Scorched Vinyl Wrap for the Chevrolet CK 1500.

The Scorched Vinyl Wrap adds a fiery burst look to the Chevrolet CK 1500.

name: Chaos Galaxy 2
summary: A turn-based Galaxy totalwar game. Choose one of 12 factions, direct dozens of admirals, control hundreds of warships, mecha and monsters, set up various buildings, study technology, and lead fleets to carry out grand strategic actions on the map of the galaxy.

name: Meat Beating: No More Horny
summary: You beat your meat.

name: The Dungeon Rules
summary: The Dungeon Rules is the most challenging game you can currently face. This game is a dungeon crawler with sokoban puzzles and cards combat.

name: Up in the Air
summary: Up in the Air is a zany, open-world game in which you play a balloon dog exploring a demented carnival populated by crazy children. Players must use a variety of power ups, from water balloons to ground pound, to fend the kids off and collect carnival tickets.

name: Anxiety Treatment with Relaxation
summary: Dr. Lora Heugens talks about anxiety, how to calm down and feel good about yourself. She talks about common scenarios that normally makes people anxious and goes into details to react to them. She describes the process that will enable you to calm yourself quickly and efficiently anytime.

name: KungFu Kickball
storyline: Compete against your friends in a fantasy sport that mixes soccer with kung fu action movies. Fly through the air and unleash a flurry of punches, kicks, and mystical arts to overpower the other team and smash the ball into their bell. Every bell ring counts as a point and the team with the most points when time runs out is crowned the winner.
summary: KungFu Kickball is a fighting-sports game where the best ball kicker wins! Punch, kick, and headbutt your way across the field to smash the ball into your opponents' bell and rack up points!

name: Axiom Alternative II
summary: Sacking an employee from The Violet Hotel soon becomes unwanted news on Grendel's malicious web blog. Can the protagonist stop Grendel from causing further problems ?

name: Deflector: Specimen Zero
summary: Deflector: Specimen Zero is a high-octane bullet hell roguelite set in a deadly world. Upgrade your character with the DNA you find, evolve him further during your runs and explore the farthest reaches of this microcosm… or die trying.

name: Nape Retroverse Collection
summary:
A collection of classics from the 8-bit era, with special add-ons like display modes, save states, rewind to help with gameplay accessibility and more!

REKNUM SOULS ADVENTURE
In the kingdom of Drissol there was a great battle in the lust for power and it was where Cheri lost her family. After the war ended, she follows her desire to bring her family back based on village rumors, said rumors say that if she manages to get the 4 sacred souls she will be able to open a portal to the underworld and bring her family back … Here is when our adventure begins!

PLOID
A couple of years after the events of V.O.I.D. the Ploids have formed the patrol that protects time and space to avoid repeating the history of V.O.I.D. With Dr. Elo, also Alpha and Omega Ploids enter a new link in evolution due to time travel turning them into PLOID X, a skill that allows them to have temporary improvements to their systems in order to fight. In order to become Ploid X, Omega must travel to several ruins in search of the sacred disks that contain the necessary information to be able to take the final step and evolve.

UCHUSEN & UCHUSEN 2
In Uchūsen you control the ship Kairos, designed with high technology to fight against the alien invasion Uchūsen. Your goal is to open up between the enemy base and end the invasion to win the intergalactic war. Do you have all the necessary reflexes to control Kairos and open yourself up in the enemy base?

name: When There Is No More Snow
summary: HYPER LOW RES SUPER RETRO visual novel made in ZZT with teen angst, saxophones, and UFOs.

name: Dino Galaxy Tennis
storyline:
Explore the vast dino-galaxy, squish what you can from the ancient masters, and swipe between over a dozen of dinosaurs with different special skills that you can use to smartly outwit your opponents or simply blast that burning comet straight into the rival's planet!

In Dino Galaxy Tennis you take on the role of a dinosaur, whose dream is to win the Galactic Tennis Tournament. To reach the grand final, you will have to visit 5 planets and defeat their leaders, with every victory confirmed by a unique badge.

This will not only bring you closer to the final but will also unlock special abilities that become useful in future matches. With the help of your mentor and special practices, you will be able to improve your results between tournaments. Throughout the story, you will also encounter a cheating opponent, which needs to be eliminated in a match.
summary: In Dino Galaxy Tennis you can try your chances in a Single-Player story campaign, with an option for 2 players Co-op or in up to 4-players Versus Mode. You can also try to beat cosmic records in a set of various skill-based Challenges! The game supports Remote Play on Steam!

name: RIDE 4: Ultimate 2020
summary: Buy Ultimate 2020 and expand your gaming experience with 5 exclusive bikes and 10 extra events.

name: Reigns: Beyond
summary:
Reigns: Beyond challenges players to navigate the cosmos as an intergalactic indie rock band, plotting their rise to *star*dom, traveling from planet to planet and gig to gig on their quest for fame and fortune. Play local (and not-so-local) clubs throughout the galaxy, recruiting alien band members along the way, and rock out across the universe! But make sure you're managing your ship's resources and keeping your crew in check while on this interstellar tour because one wrong decision may leave you dead in space! 
 
FEATURES 
- Unlock the legendary Galactic Guitars and rock out in front of your adoring fans. 
- Fight pirates, overzealous tax collectors and more in swiping dogfights. 
- Hang out on your ship for band practice and offer directions to lost space travelers. 
- Meet 60+ curious characters, including your manager, Lord Shark, Strombo the scholarly mollusk, Gron the space bear, ... and of course your crew and your ship's know-it-all A.I. 
- Over 1400 decision cards. Infinite possibilities! 
- Original soundtrack by Sam Webster (GRINDSTONE)

name: Nail Salon: Style and Makeup Bag
summary: It's manicure time! Let your creativity and imagination run wild as you paint and design the most fantastic nails. Recreate your favourite styles!

name: Into the Dungeon
summary: Explore Dungeons, Solve Puzzles, Fight Monsters and collect some Loot!

name: Shafted
storyline: SHAFTED is a micro-mining simulator with an emphasis on letting you quickly build out your colony. Single rounds are fast and short. The alien clients swoop in to extract contract payments. Clear out those clients and call it a day.
summary: Shafted is a quick resource management game. Build your mini mining colony. Optimize your mineral outputs. Strategically position your buildings with turn based tactics. Pay off your contracts or else you'll get shafted.

name: Demonicute
summary: Hardcore platformer.

name: Medieval Arms
summary: Medieval Arms is a third person, action slasher game. Engage in hack and slash action vs NPCs, as well as holding control points to win.

name: Karma Collector
summary: This is an action combat game that is played with with the D and A keys or a controller. You earn experience points by defeating enemies. When you have earned enough your rank will increase, which raises your attributes such as your attack power. A tutorial is available.

name: Infinite Links
summary:
Talismans are magical items that contain great power, even with some that can grant any desire. Kronos, a boy training as a wizard, and Serene, who consider one another as siblings, become enveloped in a Talisman conspiracy. Will they be able to save themselves and the world from the threatening danger?

Equip Talismans to the Skill Board to acquire skills and fatal moves to turn the tides in turn-based battles. Forging and upgrading weapons, armor and Talismans from materials will grant you additional advantages. There are also strategic elements with battle formations and traps, and not to mention the variety of quests, arena and monster achievements that await as challenges!

name: Twin Blades of the Three Kingdoms
summary: A retro-style RPG based on the Romance of the Three Kingdoms. From the Yellow Turban Rebellion to the Battle of Red Cliffs, Xu Shu is guided by a special sword. Watch this special what-if scenario unfold!

name: Wrought Flesh
summary: Rip out organs and equip them in your own body. Fight biopunk monsters and drugged-up space bandits. You are a Gajeshian Cultist: A near-mythological being built from the bodies of long-dead saints.

name: The Lost Robot: Jigsaw Puzzle Stories
summary: Find help for a lost robot by restoring its memory.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Fish Tornado
summary: A simple action game that all you need is your Left Stick! Turn your fish into a giant swarm and take down your enemies!

name: Whisper Trip
storyline:
Katanas… Who does not like those curved blades? Especially the thermal katanas ready to slash anyone or anything in a split second? But beware of your enemies; they aren’t stupid and they are unique in their own pecular way. You will learn to treat them as equals; and invent a special approach to each.

Cut them as regular chickens, evade their lunges, repel their bullets, adapt yourself, and listen carefully….

You will soon find out the benefits of cooperation with your partner. Do not hesitate to ask your trusted fellow agent to help you out of this mess.

This story is rich with unexpected twists and turns, where each move leads to profound consequences… Think before you act!
summary: Whisper Trip is a fast-paced side-scrolling co-op action game with cyberpunk elements. You are a new employee of the TPF (Tactical Police Force), a unit dedicated to the prevention of terrorist activities and the destruction of criminal groups...

name: Aisu Kuriimu Simulator
summary: Ice Cream Simulator is a game about making ice cream.

name: A Perfect Day
summary: ‘A Perfect Day’ let you look back on the 90’s of Mainland China, and as a 12 years old child, to experience an unexpected growing by a AVG game way.

name: Blocksplode
summary: Blocksplode is an explosive physics-based puzzle game. Your goal is to blow up the building block structures and leave as a little as possible standing above the water level.

name: ABC Search With Me
summary: Discover new words and learn foreign languages in a fast, easy and fun way!

name: King of Fighters R-2
summary: First sold in 1999 for the NEOGEO POCKET, the massively popular fighting game is coming to Nintendo Switch!

name: Deep Dreams
summary: Deep Dreams is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Mariana, exploring her dream world and collecting Alters.

name: PsiloSybil
summary: An old-school, tough-as nails classic linear 3D platformer with a faithful PS1 cartoony aesthetic.

name: MechCube: Escape
summary: MechCube is not only a set of extraordinary puzzles and tricky riddles. This is a non-linear game in point-and-click adventure genre with a lot of endings, secrets, easter eggs and references to modern pop culture.

name: Amalgam
summary: Amalgam is a free Half-Life 2 singleplayer mod. Somewhere near city 17 the rebels have been trying to destroy the combine communication towers known as relays. Their efforts have been futile until now... You as Gordon Freeman must help the rebels sabotage the combine relays.

name: Triangle Strategy
storyline:
Command a group of warriors as Serenoa, heir of House Wolffort, in a tangled plot where your decisions make all the difference. Key choices you make will bolster one of three convictions—Utility, Morality, Liberty—which together make up Serenoa’s world view and influence how the story will unfold. When faced with truly momentous decisions, multiple characters will weigh in by casting their votes on the Scales of Conviction. In these moments, the allies and decisions you make can determine the fate of whole nations and the continent of Norzelia itself.

Finding the best location in turn-based battles can tip the tide of combat in your favor. Position units on higher ground to take control of the battlefield and gain the advantage with increased range. You can also flank enemies on both sides, then strike from behind for a powerful follow-up attack. Elemental chain reactions are also an important part of combat. For example, use fire to melt icy terrain, then use lightning to electrocute it. Push the enemy into the electrified water to see sparks fly in stunning HD-2D visuals!
summary: Three nations battle for control of the dwindling resources of salt and iron in this HD-2D adventure tactical RPG. Featuring deep gameplay full of choices and consequences, strategically survey the battlefield to gain the upper hand.

name: Spacky's Nightshift
summary: Survival horror adventure in a '90s restaurant.

name: Matisse's 3D World
summary: Help Matisse repair the rocket by collecting fishies! Jump, fly and conquer the 3D unravelling world with beautiful music score and addictive gameplay. The world floating in space pops in and out of view, the flying fish give Mattise jet pack power!

name: KanaTales
summary: KanaTales is a mobile based card game featuring anime art style. While this is a card game, it's heavily dependent on a crafting system to keep its players occupied.Different from the previous work Sword Girls, the producers have made new changes to the game storyline and the balance of card strength.

name: Madball
summary: A game of controlling a constantly rolling ball through a series of unpredictable and exciting obstacles.

name: Roller Riot
summary: Get your revenge on the enemy cyborg roller derby gang! Roll and fight through a beautiful neon cityscape as CB, a genetically modified cyborg, bent on getting revenge for her past...

name: Battle Village
summary: Battle Village is a top down shooter where the player has to control a tank and defend the base from enemies.

name: Neighbourhood Cat
summary: In the peak of lockdown, you are Neighbourhood Cat, the only one around who still has the freedom to go outside. Roam the streets, visit your neighbours, listen to their stories, and spread a bit of comfort and charm. After all, you are a cat. That's what you do.

name: Examination Chambers
summary: In this short puzzle adventure, you play as a tester who has to overcome increasingly harder logic puzzles. Room by room, your actions will be commented on by a test supervisor. Place different sizes of cubes on buttons in first person to solve logic-gate-like riddles.

name: Skycadia
summary: The world of Skycadia is overrun with sky pirates -- and there's profit to be made! Take to the skies and collect bounties by shooting down the scoundrels in this light-hearted flying adventure.

name: Escape Planet 17
storyline: In Escape Planet 17, you are under the skin of Natan, a detective from the Narcotics Department. While investigating a new drug circulating on the streets, Nathan sees his partner being killed and both are framed for involvement in trafficking among others crimes. Nathan is unjustly accused, convicted, sent to a prison planet and removed from his family. During his stay on planet 17, Nathan devises a plan to escape, but a series of macabre crimes initiates a security protocol and prevents his plans. Get involved in an obscure plot involving violent gangs, synthetic drugs and a symbiotic experiment company. Giving up is not an option, escaping the planet is your mission, even if you have to get your hands dirty with blood.
summary: Escape Planet 17 is a 2D action cyberpunk platform game where you can Interact with other characters to create unique paths. Use your fighting, shooting, hacking and scanning abilities to solve crimes, defeat your enemies and escape the Planet.

name: PostItGuess.io
summary:
PostitGuess.IO is a free 3D multiplayer web guessing game.

Based on IRL game "What's in my head/ Guess Who am I?" Each player must choose the name of a character that everyone know. This name will be put on the virtual forehead of a player. The goal of the game is to be the first to discover the character that has been assigned to you and that is marked on the post-it note in your head. Each player can ask a question to the others who can only answer with "Yes" or "No".

name: Fallen London: Salon Scandal!
storyline: "What actually happened at the Duchess of Bedfordshire's infamous salon? Who was caught in the Duke's bedchamber? How did Lord J_____ die? And who stole the Vicar's cassock? The papers print such outlandish rumours! But you were there. You saw it all. And yours is the tale that will separate fact from fiction."
summary: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: Fallen London: Stolen Stanzas
storyline: "The entire print run of Julian R. Harvey's poetic epic 'Reflections on Ys' has been confiscated by the agents of Mr Pages! Investigate the contents of this mysterious volume, plan an audacious theft from a Ministry warehouse, and reunite the publisher with his product. Then maybe – just maybe – you'll be able to sneak a peek at the latest work to pique Mr Pages' ire."
summary: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: Ancient Board Game Collection
summary: Have you ever heard of Hnefatafl, a game played during the Viking Age? Or Latrunculi, popular over 2000 years ago in ancient Rome? Discover these games and many more in the "Ancient Board Game Collection". The collection includes 9 different games: Konane, Hnefatafl, Nine Men's Morris, Dablot Prejjesne, Gomoku, Halatafl, Latrunculi, Five Field Kono and Bagh-Chal.

name: Slayers, Inc.
storyline: Someone downstairs has gotten impatient, and they've sent an army of demons to invade the mortal realm! The only thing standing in the way of a fire-and-brimstone apocalypse is Slayers, Inc., a group of seasoned demon hunters who are ready and willing to not only stop the invasion, but destroy it at the source.
summary: Slayers, Inc. is a roguelite twin-stick shooter about killing hordes of demons. Acquire items to brutalize them in new and unique ways, empower yourself with Artifacts to kill 'em with style, don't forget to keep your combo going, and give those infernal fools the boot!

name: Rose Knight and Thorn Witch
summary:
Rose Knight and Thorn Witch is a fairy tale yuri visual novel series.

In Chapter One, The Girl who Wanted to Become a Knight, Derin Larkspur longs to leave the Thistle Village behind and journey to the Academy where she will train as a knight. When she hears rumors about a witch living in the woods nearby, she vows to drive the witch away to prove herself as a candidate for the Academy.

But is it a witch in the woods or something else entirely?

name: Wizards
summary: Artillery tactics games are back! Grab some friends and get ready for an all out Wizard war! Create your own way of play with over 100 unique spells to choose from. With randomly generated terrain and unlimited combinations, you'll never know what will happen next. Completely free to play.

name: Punchman
summary: Punchman is a simple 1 versus 1 fighting platforming game featuring a set of different characters, power-ups, and levels.

name: Fallen London: A Devil's Due
storyline: "Verity is on the hunt for a particular soul, and she won't take 'no' for an answer! Consort with devils high and low as you track the Lyrical Soul through infernal society, strike bargains in a primordial currency of Hell, and uncover an ancient story of love and loss."
summary: This is a DLC for the game Fallen London. It is part of the Exceptional Stories, a monthly release of new stories that are available for subscribers (Exceptional Friends) for free, and available for purchase afterwards.

name: ROOM CONTAINING CANDLE x4
summary: IT IS ROOM IN WHICH DARK

name: Maze Mart
summary: You play as Isaac looking for a bottle of milk. Through small labyrinths you will have to choose how the story will end.

name: Flipped in Love
storyline:
A journey for the truth, a story buried for years... Being a celebrity may look like fun and sun on the outside, but behind it all are endless secrets. Your life should have ended 5 years ago, but you have miraculously been granted a second chance.

From A-List celebrity to fresh newbie, the entertainment industry has become so much more different and dangerous than the way you knew it. Luckily, you are not alone: helpful friends, partners in the industry and four guys that change your life forever. You might think yourself lucky for getting it all, But the truth is... you’ve lost even more. When the truth is revealed, who will be the one you fight for?
summary:
A journey for the truth, a story buried for years...
Being a celebrity may look like fun and sun on the outside, but behind it all are endless secrets.
Your life should have ended 5 years ago, but you have miraculously been granted a second chance.
From A-List celebrity to fresh newbie, the entertainment industry has become so much more different and dangerous than the way you knew it.
Luckily, you are not alone: helpful friends, partners in the industry and four guys that change your life forever.
You might think yourself lucky for getting it all,
But the truth is... you’ve lost even more.
When the truth is revealed, who will be the one you fight for?

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe + Super Mario Party Double Pack
summary: Target Exclusive Double Pack includes both Mario Kart 8 Deluxe and Super Mario Party for Nintendo Switch.

name: Sex Search
summary: Plunge into the world of relaxation and light erotica! Mindfulness logic game with many modes.

name: The Elephant in Her Room
summary:
Sometimes a single-minded love can be too heavy. It's like an elephant. Go through her prejudiced gaze and tell her how attractive you really are.

Sokoban with some twists and romance.

name: Let's Learn Shogi
summary: From piece movements, to drops, promotion and strategic formations, you'll learn Shogi inside out! Play against a wide variety of AI opponents, developing your Shogi playing style.

name: Flight Of Nova
summary: Flight Of Nova is a flight simulation in which you take control of spacecrafts on the full-scale planet NVA-31. You will fly on different types of machines during transport and research missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics.

name: Slime Up
summary: Slime Up is an infinite jumper where you jump around the city spraying mucus out of your nostrils and sliming people who get in your way. Rise to the top taking powerful powerups. Just be careful not to fall in the river of slime beneath you...

name: Train Sim World 2: Main Spessart Bahn: Aschaffenburg - Gemünden Route Add-On
summary: A wondrous mix of steep gradients, scenic hillsides and swooping turns come to life in Train Sim World 2: Main Spessart Bahn, a timeless freight-heavy and passenger-laden corridor through the heart of the German countryside.

name: The Beatles Adventures in Pepperland
summary:
The Beatles Adventures in Pepperland is loosely based on the 1968 film Yellow Submarine.

Play as The Beatles and fight blue meanies in this colorful adventure in the unearthly paradise called Pepperland.

name: Computerfriend
summary:
The year is 1999. The place is Godfield, Louisiana: the tech capital of the world, where the sky bleeds acid and the mud boils in the bayou. It’s time for your state-mandated digital therapy.

Computerfriend is a text-based interactive fiction game by Kit Riemer. 20-60 minute playtime, 6 endings.

name: Paradox of Hope VR
summary: Paradox of Hope is an immersive single-player VR shooter with survival and horror elements. Explore mysterious metro mazes of post-apocalyptic Moscow, use stealth or combat approach to achieve your goal, upgrade your equipment and arsenal, and enjoy the atmospheric moments of stalker’s life.

name: ZJ the Ball's What's Different Game: Breakthrough Gaming Activity Center
summary:
A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Activity Center" series!
This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: The Mayor of Sanctuary
summary: Retiring from your duties as mayor sounded nice… but something isn’t quite right, and you surely can’t enjoy solitude while the townspeople, your people, are in dire need.

name: Crimson Phoenix Rise
summary: The game is a story-driven 2D platformer, with some Metroidvania aspects, where the player determines the outcome of the game based upon their “Morality” score, which itself is based upon the player's decision to kill in the game.

name: World Class Champion Soccer
summary: The festival in which the whole world is united by soccer will begin! Win the game and get a variety of equipment, grow up and become a world class player!

name: Sunshine Shuffle
storyline: Play cards with a group of adorable animal friends who robbed the largest bank on the Eastern Seaboard 12 years ago, and are willing to let you decorate their boat in return for not being executed by the mafia.
summary: Sunshine Shuffle is a narrative poker adventure featuring talking animals with criminal pasts and adorable outfits! Play Texas Hold 'Em with the remaining members of the 'Morning Shift', a group of working-class creatures turned would-be Robin Hoods who crossed the Fishie Mob, and mostly lived to tell the tale. Unravel the story of how the largest bank on the Eastern Seaboard was robbed in a single afternoon as you play. Win hands to earn tokens and decorate the S.S. Sunshine with new light fixtures, chairs, card decks, and more. And try to boogie to the game's vibrant, wiggle-inducing original ska soundtrack as you stare into the cold eyes of a 12 year-old kitten with nothing left to lose.

name: Office Elevator
summary: Today might be just a regular workday, or you might end up in a complete alternative reality. Office Elevator is a survival horror game with puzzles that takes place in a dark universe.

name: Street Dreams
summary: Street Dreams is a fast-paced VR action FPS set in a psychedelic dream world. Evade opponents in a high-speed car chase using a variety of weapons at your disposal.

name: The Umbridge Estate
summary: The Umbridge Estate is a 1-4 Player Co-Op Survival Horror Game like no other. Solve the riddles of the maze, read the notes of the people who came before you but most importantly… survive the horrors within.

name: Star Sled
summary: Steer your lightning-fast Star Sled through multiple missions designed to test the reflexes of even the most dedicated space pilots! Encircle and capture life-giving Sparks with your Sled’s laser lariat while avoiding deadly Trion Sentries. Advance to the end and take on the Trion Emperor himself!

name: Betrayal.io
summary:
Hi everyone!

Thanks for all your patience, we are excited to announce the next (more open) alpha phase of Betrayal- an online multiplayer social deception/murder mystery game!

We have been big fans of the genre for years now, and it's been some of our dream to make an interactive, real-time version of Werewolf/Mafia/Town of Salem since the Zombs.io days. We are super happy to see the success of Among Us, which many of our team has been playing - and that has inspired us to finish our version and hopefully push the envelope on the whole social mystery genre!

With that said, we welcome everyone in this discord to try the game and help give us feedback, suggestions, and more! We've been working on this for quite some time and I'm excited for everyone to try it out and let us know what you think!

name: World Flight
summary:
Fly around the world without limits with your Meta Quest 2 headset.
Feel the freedom, travel anywhere in the planet and enjoy all its beauty and diversity.
Plan your flight on the map with a powerful search engine and fly a plane or a helicopter with totally different gameplays.

name: Nice Try!
summary: One little car, one little level. What could go wrong? Apparently, everything could go wrong. Test your patience!

name: Hello, World!
storyline:
Harsh tests are waiting for you.
Move forward and prove yourself.
The world awaits your release.
summary: A humanoid walking simulator.

name: The Surreal Imaginarium
summary: Enter "The Surreal Imaginarium", a virtual gallery full of other-worldy interactive paintings waiting for you to unlock their secrets. Explore the 23 paintings that inhabit the Day Gallery, the Interdimensional Journey, and the Night Gallery, as you activate their varied and colorful animations, sounds and effects.

name: World-Splitter
summary:
World-Splitter” is a 2D² puzzle platformer, challenging you with multidimensional puzzles.

You'll travel through wonderful and fantastic worlds that are beautifully animated and full of tricky challenges.

The game features a unique gameplay mechanic: A combination of jump & run elements and logical thinking puzzles. Each level consist of two parallel worlds separated by the ’Dimension Rift‘. The character can move freely through the Rift and interacts only with the visible parts of both worlds.

You have to master the Rift and make it pave your way through the worlds!

name: Agelast
summary: Agelast is a horror game set in Korea, played from the perspective of a student in a difficult situation. Find a way out and interact as you progress through the story. There are no puzzles.
